Welcome to chordparser’s documentation!¶

chordparser is a Python 3 package that provides a musical framework for analysing chords. Click on these links to find more about what it is and why it is.

Get started with Installation and then get an overview with the Quickstart. The rest of the docs describe each musical class that chordparser provides in detail so you can use the framework effectively.
